scripts.docker-create: doctl k8s cluster create --region fra1 --node-pool "name=opentezos-frontend;size=s-1vcpu-2gb;count=1;auto-scale=true;min-nodes=1;max-nodes=3" opentezos-frontend --wait && doctl kubernetes cluster kubeconfig save opentezos-frontend
scripts.docker-push: doctl registry login && docker tag rtx/opentezos-frontend registry.digitalocean.com/rtx/opentezos-frontend && docker push registry.digitalocean.com/rtx/opentezos-frontend
scripts.docker-patch: doctl registry kubernetes-manifest | kubectl --context do-fra1-opentezos-frontend apply -f - && kubectl --context do-fra1-opentezos-frontend patch serviceaccount default -p '{"imagePullSecrets": [{"name": "registry-rtx"}]}'
scripts.docker-secrets: kubectl --context do-fra1-opentezos-frontend create secret generic person --from-env-file=.env
scripts.docker-update: yarn run docker-build && yarn run docker-push && yarn run docker-restart
scripts.docker-install: yarn run docker-build && yarn run docker-push && yarn run docker-patch && yarn run docker-deploy && yarn run docker-serve
